Drake Escarion:
Oh, two-legged creature ... What brings you to the mountains? If you are going to kill me, then do not hesitate. My eggs are gone, and without them I have no need to live ... Where are my eggs? Where did those who stole them go? Maybe they crossed the mountains and fled to the Elven village? Or went to the Sea of ​​Spores? Oh, I don’t know ...
